system.description:
Benefit

The character can use any standard hilt or curved hilt plasma blade without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -4 penalty on attack rolls made with single bladed and curved hilt plasma blades

Special

A character with Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords or Fencing Swords) only takes a -2 penalty on attack rolls when using a plasma blade.

Tutoring

Time: 3 Days

Benefit: Attack penalty when using a plasma blade is
reduced to -2. If the character has Archaic Weapon
Proficiency (Combat Swords or Fencing Swords) feat, the
penalty is reduced to -1.
